\subsection{Detailed Description}
Exception inheriting from \hyperlink{classutils_1_1slightrow__error}{slightrow\+\_\+error}. It is thrown when\+:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item input string is not set
\item input string is empty 
\end{DoxyItemize}
